headline: Genuine Parts considers separating units, Bloomberg News reports
summary: Industrial company Genuine Parts is considering a breaking up of its industrial and auto parts units, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter. The company is evaluating a potential spin-off of its auto segment, the report said. Discussions are still in early stages and the company may retain its existing structure, it added.

headline: Genuine Parts stock soars on potential breakup consideration
summary: Investing.com -- Genuine Parts Co (NYSE:GPC) stock surged 4.1% in after-hours trading Friday following reports that the industrial and automotive parts distributor is considering splitting its business units.
